name: FIREBRAND
description:
!!DISCLAIMER!! - Windows version heavily recommended over WebGL version.

Unite the Light with this small scale puzzle platformer based around the strength of fire with combustibles! For Brackeys Game Jam 2021.1. Collab of MerleBirb and Bravveo.For Brackeys Game Jam 2021.1. Collab of MerleBirb and Bravveo.
